data.actual_result: Emoji picker picks the emoji to the left of what you selected the second time
data.expected_result: Emoji picker picks the emoji you chose
data.short_description: Selecting a frequently used emoji in the emoji picker, sending the message, and selecting that emoji again selects the wrong emoji the second time
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the emoji picker - Select a random custom emoji from the second row of your frequently used - Send the message containing the emoji - Select the same custom emoji again and observe the emoji chosen - If this doesn't happen with one row, try on the other rows in your frequently used - Note: this will continue each time you send the message with the emoji, moving in order
